result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert C. Orvis

records.addlTxt:
NO RECORD MADE. Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State. Defendant Robert C. Orvis in court. Clerk. M.Burke.  Victim is present in court. DE and state had discussions regarding an offer. The DE would like to get an attorney.
Status conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk. M.Burke. DE states he does not have an attorney and does not want one. DE states he has gotten all of the discovery. STC set to 09/22/22 at 10:00 to give the state time to talk with the DE.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
Reinstated and continued posted
    *No Weapons especially firearms.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with:   Rachael B-O, Renee C
Phoned JS at 217pm  Spoke to Veronica/jk

02:17 PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:   The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.   Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court. Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 01:15 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.   Warrant vacated. $1000 Cash Bond Reinstated w/ additional conditions (see bond entry). mi
DE schedules a voluntary appearance for 07-11-22 at 1pm Intake.   DA notified.

ARREST WARRANT
KPD 22026812
  MUST POST OR HOLD FOR COURT

03:25 PM  Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  No appearance by defendant. Warrant Authorized. Cash bond set at $1500.00  MUST POST OR HOLD FOR COURT.  Cash bond forfeited.
and witness list filed by the State
